Text:

This is purely informational for the rest of you. Documented errors since MP4 began:
LOL=128 | ASAP=3 | 2HD=2 | COMPULSION=1 | LMAO=1
IMMERSE=1 | FOV=1 | YesTV=0 | EVOLVE=0 | TLA=0

As Bogie said "but look at the sheer number of them!"

LOL has yet to put out an undamaged episode of SVU
LOL has put out only ONE undamaged episode of Revolution
Why not let someone who knows what they're doing have thses shows?
@MP4SUX wow, where have you been my whole torrenting career. Thanks for the info I'm glad you document this stuff. gross pixelation errors bug me to death.

To quote the Blues Brothers - I'm on a mission from God.

There was once XOR that put out continuous damaged goods. It tool a year for "The Scene" to get rid of them and restor quality.

Now LOL has been putting out continuously damaged goods for close to a year now - here's hoping and end to their evil reign is at hand.

When bad drops out - good ALWAYS fills the gap.

AVIGUY
